response.job_title: ELLIS Ph.D. student under the supervision of Dr. Massimiliano Pontil (CSML), Dr. Claudio Semini (DLS), and Dr. Carlos Mastalli (RoMi)
response.summary:
I am a Colombian engineer with a strong passion for Computer Science and Robotics. 
I am especially attracted to research in legged locomotion, dexterous manipulation, optimal control, unsupervised and reinforcement learning, and most fields where AI is being used to advance robotics.
response.skills: Python, C++, Robotics, Programming, Research, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Matlab, Git, Python (Programming Language), Robot Operating System (ROS), Point Cloud Library (PCL), Artificial Intelligence (AI), Computer Science, Deep Learning, Autodesk Fusion 360, Java, JavaScript, TensorFlow, Linux

company.name: IRI - Institut de Robòtica i Informàtica Industrial, CSIC-UPC

profile_positions.company: IRI - Institut de Robòtica i Informàtica Industrial, CSIC-UPC
profile_positions.description:
I Work under the supervision of Dr. Francesc Moreno on the following projects:
- Learning natural-looking legged locomotion with Reinforcement Learning techniques and template dynamical models
- Interactive Perception-Action-Learning for Modelling Objects (IPALM)
Previously I assisted in projects "Human hand motion forecasting and pose discretization" for Dr.Júlia Borràs Sol. And "Virtual avatar generation from single RGB images" for Dr. Jordi Sanchez Riera.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Research project: Conceptual design, implementation, and evaluation of an approach to the handling of plastic bags (deformable materials) using a two-arm robot and 3D vision guidance. The system used a multi-stereographic camera set-up to recurrently:
1. Detect the 3D structure of the bag
2. Detect possible robot-grasping points
3. Plan and execute robot manipulations of the grasping points to reach the target material topology.
profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher

profile_positions.description: The main focus of my internship at INVITE was the study, design, and development of a system to manipulate deformable materials (plastic bags) with an industrial dual-arm robot, 3D vision guidance and force feedback.
profile_positions.title: Robotics Intern

profile_positions.description: Developed front and back-end of administrative tools that allowed the control and monitoring of Busescool’s real-time database and services
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Courses tutored:
- Data structures and algorithms
- Numerical methods
- Control theory
- Object-oriented programming
- Basic programming
profile_positions.title: Engineering faculty tutor

education.degree_name: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence

company.name: Istituto Italiano di Tecnologia
company.description: The Istituto Italiano di Tecnologia (IIT) is a foundation established jointly by the Italian Ministry of Education, Universities and Research and the Ministry of Economy and Finance to promote excellence in basic and applied research and to contribute to the economic development of Italy. The primary goals of the IIT are the creation and dissemination of scientific knowledge as well as the strengthening of Italy's technological competitiveness. To achieve these two goals, the IIT will cooperate with both academic institutions and private organizations, fostering through these partnerships scientific development, technological advances and training in high technology.
